cause.description:
All around the world there are some psycho's that torture/abuse animals. About three days prior to making this cause an evil sycomaniac choped off his Husky's head with a chainsaw :-( I believe that there should be a jail for the evil monsters that torture/abuse animals, and they should never be able to ever get a household animal.
1. Animal abuse is wrong, It MUST be stopped!!!!
2. Animals have feelings too!!!!!
3. We love animals!!!! :-)
cause.name: Animal Cruelty
